i1.name: Mortal Will
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Pantheon''' gains a [[stack]] of ''Mortal Will'' when he lands a [[basic attack]] {{tip|on-hit}} or casts an [[ability]], up to a maximum of 5. At 5 stacks, '''Pantheon's''' next basic ability consumes the stacks to grant bonus effects.
'''Pantheon''' gains maximum stacks of ''Mortal Will'' upon starting the game, completing a {{si|Recall}} channel, and [[death|respawning]].
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Pantheon gains a stack of Mortal Will when he lands a basic attack on-hit or casts an ability, up to a maximum of 5. At 5 stacks, Pantheon's next basic ability consumes the stacks to grant bonus effects.
Pantheon gains maximum stacks of Mortal Will upon starting the game, completing a Recall channel, and death.

q1.name: Comet Spear
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Pantheon''' {{tip|channel|charges}} while being {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 10% for up to 4 seconds to increase ''Comet Spear's'' {{sti|range}} after {{fd|0.35}} seconds of channeling. ''Comet Spear'' can be recast at any time within its duration.

{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Pantheon''' hurls his spear in the target direction, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies hit, {{ccs|increased|physical}} against enemies below {{as|20% of their '''maximum''' health}} but reduced by 50% against enemies beyond the first. Total damage is reduced by 30% against {{tip|minions}} and {{tip|monsters}}.

Releasing the ability within {{fd|0.35}} seconds causes '''Pantheon''' to instead thrust his spear in the target direction, dealing the same {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies hit and refunding 60% of ''Comet Spear's'' {{sti|cooldown}}. The thrust's damage is not reduced against enemies beyond the first.

If '''Pantheon''' is {{tip|interrupt|interrupted}} during the charge, or the charge completes without reactivation, ''Comet Spear'' is cancelled and the ability is put on full cooldown but refunds {{sti|mana|{{as|half the mana cost}}}}.

{{sbc|{{ai|Mortal Will|Pantheon}}:}} Deals an additional {{as|{{pp|20 to 240}}|physical damage}} {{as|(+ 115% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}, affected by the previous damage reductions, to all enemies hit. Consumes the stacks upon recasting.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Pantheon charges while being slowed by 10% for up to 4 seconds to increase Comet Spear's range after 0.35 seconds of channeling. Comet Spear can be recast at any time within its duration.
Recast: Pantheon hurls his spear in the target direction, dealing physical damage to all enemies hit, Unknown value: ccs increased physical against enemies below 20% of their maximum health but reduced by 50% against enemies beyond the first. Total damage is reduced by 30% against minions and monsters.
Releasing the ability within 0.35 seconds causes Pantheon to instead thrust his spear in the target direction, dealing the same physical damage to all enemies hit and refunding 60% of Comet Spear's cooldown. The thrust's damage is not reduced against enemies beyond the first.
If Pantheon is interrupted during the charge, or the charge completes without reactivation, Comet Spear is cancelled and the ability is put on full cooldown but refunds half the mana cost.
Mortal Will: Deals an additional 20undefined âˆ’ 240undefined (based on level) (+ 115% bonus AD) bonus physical damage, affected by the previous damage reductions, to all enemies hit. Consumes the stacks upon recasting.
leveling: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|70 to 190}} {{as|(+ 115% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Increased Damage|{{ap|155 to 455}} {{as|(+ 230% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Secondary Physical Damage|{{ap|70*0.5 to 190*0.5}} {{as|(+ {{ap|115*0.5}}% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Increased Secondary Damage|{{ap|155*0.5 to 455*0.5}} {{as|(+ {{ap|230*0.5}}% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
q1.notes:
* Only the ranged version of ''Comet Spear'' can be {{tip|projectile|intercepted}}.
* ''Comet Spear'' will cast from wherever '''Pantheon''' is at the end of the cast time.
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Pantheon''' is {{tip|channel|channeling}}:
{{ct|charge|items=true,true,interrupts,false,interrupts,interrupts,interrupts,interrupts,melee}}
* Casting an item active that interrupts will cause ''Comet Spear'' to recast automatically and the active to buffer to cast afterwards.
q1.cooldown_warn: Wiki's and Riot's cooldowns do not match: Wiki's value '{{tt|{{ap|13 to 8}}|Starts post-effect}}' as '0/11.333/9.667/8/6.333/0' and riot's value '13,11.75,10.5,9.25,8' as '13/11.75/10.5/9.25/8'

effects.str:
• Physical Damage: (+ 115% bonus AD)
  • Increased Damage: (+ 230% bonus AD)
  • Secondary Physical Damage: (+ % bonus AD)
  • Increased Secondary Damage: (+ % bonus AD)

w1.name: Shield Vault
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Pantheon''' {{tip|dash|leaps}} to the front of the target enemy's location and, if the target is within 800 units upon arrival, he deals them {{as|physical damage}} and {{tip|stun|stuns}} them for 1 second.

{{sbc|{{ai|Mortal Will|Pantheon}}:}} '''Pantheon's''' next basic attack within 4 seconds has a cast time and strikes the target 3 times over a brief period, dealing {{as|{{pp|120/3 to 165/3|key=%}} AD}} {{as|physical damage}} per hit, up to {{as|{{pp|120 to 165|key=%}} AD}}. Each hit is affected by {{tip|critical strike}} modifiers and applies {{tip|on-hit}} effects at 100% effectivness.
''Empowered Shield Vault'' {{tip|basic attack reset|resets}} '''Pantheon's''' basic attack timer.
'''''Pantheon''' will attempt to basic attack the target at the end of the leap.''
w1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Pantheon leaps to the front of the target enemy's location and, if the target is within 800 units upon arrival, he deals them physical damage and stuns them for 1 second.
Mortal Will: Pantheon's next basic attack within 4 seconds has a cast time and strikes the target 3 times over a brief period, dealing 120/3% âˆ’ 165/3% (based on level) AD physical damage per hit, up to 120% âˆ’ 165% (based on level) AD. Each hit is affected by critical strike modifiers and applies on-hit effects at 100% effectivness.
Empowered Shield Vault resets Pantheon's basic attack timer.
Pantheon will attempt to basic attack the target at the end of the leap.
w1.notes:
* Applies {{tip|spell damage}} on the initial vault. Deals {{tip|default damage}} on the additional attacks from the empowered ability.
* Despite the multi-hit attack only having a hidden {{fd|0.375}}-second cast time, '''Pantheon''' will remain {{tip|lockout|unable to act}} until the last strike has been dealt.
** The empowered attack's total time is affected by '''Pantheon's''' {{stil|attack speed}}.
** {{pending for test}} The attack's total time is the cast time plus '''Pantheon's''' attack windup time.
* The 3 strikes that occurs after ''Empowered Shield Vault'' each apply a stack of {{ai|Mortal Will|Pantheon}}, even if the attacks are {{tip|dodged}}, {{tip|blocked}}, or missed while '''Pantheon''' is {{tip|blind|blinded}}.

e1.name: Aegis Assault
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Pantheon''' braces his shield in the target direction, {{tip|channel|channeling}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds while being {{tip|slow|slowed}} for between {{pp|type=his movement direction|label1=Angle (Pantheon's movement direction)|label=Slow percentage|0; 0 to 25|key=%|0Â° (Forward); 60; 90Â°(Strafe Left/Right); 120; 150; 180Â° (Backward)|key1={{degree}}|formula=''The slow percentage is measured and updates relative to the shield's facing direction.''}}. ''Aegis Assault'' cannot be {{tip|interrupt|interrupted}} by {{tip|crowd control}}. ''Aegis Assault'' can be recast after {{fd|0.3}} seconds during the channel, and does so automatically when the channel ends.

For the duration, '''Pantheon''' is {{tip|invulnerability|invulnerable}} against non-{{tip|turret}} damage dealt by enemies from the target direction, and continuously performs strikes in a cone in front of him, dealing {{as|{{fd|8.{{recurring|3}}}}% AD}} {{as|physical damage}} every {{fd|0.125}} seconds to all enemies within the area, reduced by 50% against {{tip|minions}} and up to {{as|100% AD}} {{as|'''total''' physical damage}} against each target.
{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Pantheon''' slams with his shield in a cone in front of him, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies within the area.
{{sbc|{{ai|Mortal Will|Pantheon}}:}} '''Pantheon''' gains {{sti|{{as|60% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds after recasting.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Pantheon braces his shield in the target direction, channeling for 1.5 seconds while being slowed for between 0Â° (Forward); 60; 90Â°(Strafe Left/Right); 120; 150; 180Â° (Backward) â€’ undefined. Aegis Assault cannot be interrupted by crowd control. Aegis Assault can be recast after 0.3 seconds during the channel, and does so automatically when the channel ends.
For the duration, Pantheon is invulnerable against non-turret damage dealt by enemies from the target direction, and continuously performs strikes in a cone in front of him, dealing 8.Unknown value: recurring 3% AD physical damage every 0.125 seconds to all enemies within the area, reduced by 50% against minions and up to 100% AD total physical damage against each target.
Recast: Pantheon slams with his shield in a cone in front of him, dealing physical damage to all enemies within the area.
Mortal Will: Pantheon gains 60% bonus movement speed for 1.5 seconds after recasting.
e1.notes:
*The initial cast count as an ability activation for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{tip|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
**Detonating the ability manually is not.
* '''Pantheon''' retains his {{tip|invulnerable|invulnerability}} during the recast's cast time.
* '''Pantheon''' will slam from wherever he was at the start of the recast's' cast time.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will only block the slam's damage.
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Pantheon''' is {{tip|channel|channeling}}:
{{ct|channel|attack=false|move=true|cast=false|items=true,,, false|spells=true, true, true, false, false|interrupts=death}}
e1.cooldown_warn: Wiki's and Riot's cooldowns do not match: Wiki's value '{{tt|{{ap|22 to 16}}|Starts post-effect}}' as '0/20/18/16/14/0' and riot's value '22,20.5,19,17.5,16' as '22/20.5/19/17.5/16'

r1.name: Grand Starfall
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Pantheon''' gains {{sti|{{as|armor penetration}}}}.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Pantheon''' {{tip|channel|channels}} for 2 seconds, then leaps high into the air, {{tip|vanish|vanishing}} and becoming {{tip|cc-immune|immune to crowd control}} until he reappears. While in the air, '''Pantheon''' {{tip|channel|channels}} again for {{fd|2.45}} seconds and grants {{tip|sight}} around the target location {{fd|0.5}} seconds into the channel.

After {{fd|1.125}} seconds into the channel, '''Pantheon''' prepares for landing by marking his destination with his spear which flies to the location over {{fd|0.1625}} seconds. The spear deals {{as|{{pp|type=[[File:Comet Spear.png|20px|border]] Comet Spear's rank|40 to 190 for 6|0;1;2;3;4;5}} {{as|(+ 115% '''bonus''' AD)}} physical damage|physical damage}} to enemies near its landing point and {{tip|slows}} them by 50% for 2 seconds.

Over the remaining {{fd|1.1625}} seconds, '''Pantheon''' crashes down and creates a shockwave alongside him that travels toward the target location, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies within its path, decreased by up to 50% for those hit at the edge of the area. Upon completion of the channel, '''Pantheon''' {{tip|blink|reappears}} at the target location and gains full stacks of {{ai|Mortal Will|Pantheon}}.
''Grand Starfall'' is put on a 30 second {{sti|cooldown}} if the first channel is canceled.
r1.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Pantheon gains armor penetration.
Active: Pantheon channels for 2 seconds, then leaps high into the air, vanishing and becoming immune to crowd control until he reappears. While in the air, Pantheon channels again for 2.45 seconds and grants sight around the target location 0.5 seconds into the channel.
After 1.125 seconds into the channel, Pantheon prepares for landing by marking his destination with his spear which flies to the location over 0.1625 seconds. The spear deals 0;1;2;3;4;5 â€’ undefined (+ 115% bonus AD) physical damage to enemies near its landing point and slows them by 50% for 2 seconds.
Over the remaining 1.1625 seconds, Pantheon crashes down and creates a shockwave alongside him that travels toward the target location, dealing magic damage to all enemies within its path, decreased by up to 50% for those hit at the edge of the area. Upon completion of the channel, Pantheon reappears at the target location and gains full stacks of Mortal Will.
Grand Starfall is put on a 30 second cooldown if the first channel is canceled.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|300 to 700}} {{as|(+ 100% AP)}}|Minimum Damage|{{ap|300/2 to 700/2}} {{as|(+ 50% AP)}}}}
r1.notes:
* Spear damage is not empowered by {{ai|Mortal Will|Pantheon}}.
* The spear's damage is not increased against enemies below {{as|20% of their '''maximum''' health}}.
* During the second channel, '''Pantheon's''' {{sti|{{as|health}}}} cannot be reduced below {{as|1|health}}. All excess damage is ignored, with the exception of {{tip|raw damage}}.
** '''Pantheon''' will instantly die upon reappearing if he reaches this threshold.
* Abilities that target '''Pantheon''' will redirect to the last location.
* [[Ping|Pinging]] the ability will inform allies in [[Hotkeys and commands|chat]] which {{tip|sight|visible}} enemy champions are in range of ''Grand Starfall''.
* '''Pantheon''' is considered to be in his original casting position even after leaping, but he will {{tip|blink}} to the target location the moment the second channel completes.
* Using ''Grand Starfall'' will inform allies with a ping.
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Pantheon''' is {{tip|channel|channeling}} (first channel):
{{ct|channel|items=false|spells=false|attack=false|move=false|cast=false|consume=false|interrupts=death, ground, root, silence}}
* The second channel has the same interactions except it can only be interrupted by {{tip|death}} and not any form of {{tip|crowd control}} because '''Pantheon''' is {{tip|cc-immune|immune to crowd control}}.
* ''Grand Starfall's'' first channel will also be interrupted if he enters the {{ai|Realm of Death|Mordekaiser}}.
r1.cooldown_warn: Wiki's and Riot's cooldowns do not match: Wiki's value '{{tt|{{ap|180 to 150}}|Starts on cast}}' as '0/150/120/0' and riot's value '180,165,150' as '180/165/150'

effects.str:
• Magic Damage: (+ 100% AP)
  • Minimum Damage: (+ 50% AP)
